CustomField.description: Comma-delimited list of Group IDs derived from the DocumentFolder sharedTo entries from Metadata API. https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/atlas.en-us.api_meta.meta/api_meta/meta_folder.htm
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Comma-delimited list of Group IDs derived from the DocumentFolder sharedTo entries from Metadata API.
CustomField.label: Group IDs
